titles.title: Holding Violent Criminals and Child Predators Accountable Act of 2022
Holding Violent Criminals and Child Predators Accountable Act of 2022
A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to hold violent criminals and child predators accountable.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Holding Violent Criminals and Child Predators Accountable Act of 2022
This bill increases criminal penalties for certain crimes involving child sexual abuse and interstate domestic violence that results in the death of the victim.
